data.title: Lucille Ida Baldwin Obituary 2006
data.meta_description: Lucille I. Baldwin, 77, of Beaumont died Tuesday, March 14, 2006 at Memorial Hermann Baptist Hospital in Beaumont, TX. She was a lifelong resident of Beaumont, and was a proud m...
data.text:
Lucille I. Baldwin, 77, of Beaumont died Tuesday, March 14, 2006 at Memorial Hermann Baptist Hospital in Beaumont, TX. She was a lifelong resident of Beaumont, and was a proud member of Creekwood Baptist Church in Beaumont and a homemaker. Funeral services will be 10:00 a.m. on Friday, March 17, 2006 at Memorial Funeral Home of Vidor, with Pastor Ronald Lee officiating, and burial to follow at Magnolia Cemetery in Beaumont, TX. Visitation will begin at 6:00 p.m. on Thursday, March 16, 2006 at Memorial Funeral Home Chapel. She was preceded in death by her parents Thomas and Madie Baldwin, and brother, Thomas Henry Baldwin. She is survived by her niece Sharon Joan Baldwin Davis of New Mexico, nephew Tommy Baldwin of Port Arthur, TX., and numerous cousins, and loving friends.

Cemetery:

Magnolia Cemetery Pine St. Beaumont, TX (map/driving directions)

Visitation:

6:00 PM to 10:00 PM at Memorial Funeral Home of Vidor 1750 Hwy Vidor, TX on March 16, 2006 (map/driving directions) Memorial Funeral Home of Vidor 1750 Hwy Vidor, TX (map/driving directions)

Service:

10:00 AM at Memorial funeral Home of Vidor 1750 Hwy 12 Vidor, TX 77662 on March 17, 2006 (map/driving directions)
